content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #216

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 10

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: Response
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

The hook this service should be invoked on. See Hook Catalog

Proposed Wording:

The hook this service should be invoked on.

Comment:
The hook catelog has a version and refers to this specificaiton. If this is the chosen approach, this document should not refer to the hooks specification.
Suggest to have a separate section to explain this.

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will fix the "See Hook Catalog" broken link and reference the hooks section

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #216

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
We will fix the "See Hook Catalog" broken link and reference the hooks section

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
